h2_title: Flint Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: Generally, you want to stick close to the Vanguard, dodge the punches, and build up focus to perform heavy attacks. You can knock it over like this, where it will be on all fours, so you can target it while it's vulnerable.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Flint_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Flint Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Flint Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Generally, you want to stick close to the Vanguard, dodge the punches, and build up focus to perform heavy attacks. You can knock it over like this, where it will be on all fours, so you can target it while it's vulnerable.
